name: TV Head: Delivery
description:
This is a game I made for the HerdCon/MU Game Guild 2021 Game Jam! The theme was cryptids so I went with a "cryptid" I like, the guy who put old TVs on people's porches while wearing a TV on his head. I made this game in 26 hours!

Walk around as the famous TV Head, and deliver as many TVs to the houses as you can before the time runs out!
